title: Single of The Week: Marina and The Diamonds
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/mandd.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/mandd.jpg)

Her work may essentially be a cross section of sounds taken from various female singer song writers, but **Marina & The Diamond’s** single _‘I am not a Robot’_ still manages to hit the spot despite its lack of originality. Her voice has a quaintness that carries the lyrics above mediocrity, the instrumentation may be simplistic; but the sound as a whole has a certain charm despite the obvious shortcomings. It’s unashamedly empowering, filled with passion and a deserved single of the week.

[Watch The Video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S_oMD6-6q5Y)

[Check Out Her Website](http://www.marinaandthediamonds.com/)

[Download ‘I am not a Robot’](http://www.billysuede.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/1-03-I-Am-Not-A-Robot-1.mp3)
